DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effects High-Fat Meal Bexagliflozin Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 kg/m2 32.0 kg/m2 . 2 . Are willing use contraception . 3 . Are nonsmoker least 3 month prior screen . 4 . Are willing able stay overnight clinical research facility require protocol . 1 . Women nurse pregnant . 2 . Individuals clinically significant history allergy drug latex . 3 . Have history alcohol drug dependence last 12 month . 4 . Have use prescription overthecounter ( OTC ) drug within 14 day receive study drug . 5 . Individuals unable ( e.g. , food intolerance ) unwilling consume highfat breakfast within 25 minute .
